VALUES

INSERT INTO HR_M_COMPANY
ROW_ID , SORT_NBR , STATUS , DELETED_FLAG , ORIGIN_FLAG , ORIGIN_APP , NOTES , COMPANY_MARK , COMPANY_CODE , COMPANY_NAME , SORT_NAME , COMPANY_NAME_EN , IS_BLOC , SUP_COMPANY_ID , COMPANY_CLASS , COMPANY_TYPE , CUSSUP_TYPE , COMPANY_SCALE , TRACE_SOURCE , TRACE_PEOPLE , TP_CELL , LOGO , PROVINCE , CITY , COUNTY , COMPANY_ADDRESS , ID_CARD , COMPANY_PHOTO , LONGITUDE , LATITUDE , AREA , REGISTER_TIME , REGISTER_IP , OPEN_TIME
VALUES
#{item.rowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sortNbr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.originFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.originApp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isBloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.supCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.companyClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cussupType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.companyScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.traceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tracePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tpCell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.logo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyPhoto,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.update: UPDATE HR_M_COMPANY SET DELETED_FLAG = '1' WHERE ROW_ID = #{ rowId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach: UPDATE HR_M_COMPANY SET DELETED_FLAG = '1' WHERE ROW_ID =#{item}

UPDATE HR_M_COMPANY SET DELETED_FLAG = '1' WHERE DELETED_FLAG = '0'
AND ${item.RECORD_CON} = #{item.RECORD_VALUES}
